name: Tapster Beta Testing now open!
description:
Masked Ninja Games
Tapster! Beta TestingHow to Play:

Move with W,A,S,D or Arrow Keys Up, Down, Left, Right

Press Space bar to Fill Drinks. Release Space bar to Serve Drinks.

Press P key to mute sounds. Collect Empty bottles before they fall to the floor!

Do not let Customers reach end of the bar without a Drink! Have Fun!
